scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native && npm run build.angular
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns run android
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && ns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-cast && ns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && ns plugin remove nativescript-cast && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm run setup
